meta.description: Interactive skills web — maps capabilities to client outcomes

skills.name: Full-Stack Development
skills.summary: End-to-end web application architecture — Node.js, Express, vanilla JS, REST APIs, SQLite, PWA.
skills.clientValue: Your idea becomes a working product, not just a mockup. From database to pixel, built to scale.

skills.name: API Design & Integration
skills.summary: RESTful API architecture with OpenAPI/Swagger documentation, rate limiting, input validation, and versioning.
skills.clientValue: Your systems talk to each other reliably. Partners integrate easily. Data flows safely.

skills.name: Database Architecture
skills.summary: Relational schema design, migrations, query optimization, backup/restore, and data integrity enforcement.
skills.clientValue: Your data is organized, fast to query, and impossible to lose. Migrations run without downtime.

skills.name: Progressive Web Apps
skills.summary: Offline-first architecture with service workers, IndexedDB caching, install prompts, and push notifications.
skills.clientValue: Your app works everywhere — even without internet. Install it like a native app, no app store needed.

skills.name: Web Performance
skills.summary: Core Web Vitals optimization, Lighthouse CI, bundle analysis, lazy loading, code splitting.
skills.clientValue: Pages load in under 2 seconds. Users stay longer. Google ranks you higher.

skills.name: WCAG Accessibility
skills.summary: WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA compliance, Section 508, VPAT/ACR authoring, axe-core testing, screen reader QA.
skills.clientValue: Everyone can use your product — it's the law for government, and the right thing for everyone else.

skills.name: DevOps & CI/CD
skills.summary: GitHub Actions, automated testing, linting, SBOM generation, Lighthouse CI, deployment pipelines.
skills.clientValue: Every code change is tested, scanned, and deployed automatically. No manual steps, no human error.

skills.name: Automated Testing
skills.summary: Unit testing (Vitest), integration testing (supertest), accessibility testing (axe-core), 80%+ coverage enforcement.
skills.clientValue: Bugs get caught before users see them. Refactoring is safe. Confidence ships with every release.

skills.name: NIST 800-171 / 800-53
skills.summary: Full implementation of NIST SP 800-171r2/r3 and 800-53 Rev 5 controls. SPRS scoring, POA&M management.
skills.clientValue: Pass your NIST assessment the first time. Protect CUI. Win DoD contracts.

skills.name: CMMC 2.0 Certification
skills.summary: CMMC Level 1–3 readiness assessment, gap analysis, POA&M development, evidence collection automation.
skills.clientValue: Get certified to bid on DoD contracts. Know exactly where your gaps are and how to close them.

skills.name: FedRAMP Authorization
skills.summary: FedRAMP SSP generation, continuous monitoring dashboards, POA&M tracking, OSCAL export.
skills.clientValue: Sell your cloud service to every federal agency. One authorization, governmentwide reuse.

skills.name: Zero Trust Architecture
skills.summary: Continuous trust evaluation, risk-based access, device posture, MFA enforcement, micro-segmentation.
skills.clientValue: Every request is verified. No implicit trust. Your architecture matches the executive order.

skills.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
skills.summary: TOTP-based MFA, PIV/CAC smart card integration, backup codes, recovery flows.
skills.clientValue: Passwords alone aren't enough. Add a second factor without making users hate you.

skills.name: OSCAL Automation
skills.summary: NIST OSCAL catalog/profile/SSP generation, machine-readable compliance evidence, GRC automation.
skills.clientValue: Compliance artifacts generated automatically. No more 200-page Word docs — machine-readable from day one.

skills.name: Section 508 Compliance
skills.summary: Trusted Tester methodology, VPAT 2.5/ACR authoring, remediation planning, procurement language review.
skills.clientValue: Your ICT product is legally compliant for federal purchase. VPAT ready for any agency.

skills.name: DHS Trusted Tester
skills.summary: DHS Trusted Tester 5.x baseline conformance testing methodology for Section 508 evaluation.
skills.clientValue: Testing performed by the same methodology federal agencies use. Results they trust.

skills.name: Servant Leadership
skills.summary: Military-forged servant leadership practice. Team development, mentoring, conflict resolution, stakeholder alignment.
skills.clientValue: I don't just build what you ask for — I make sure it's what you actually need. Your success is the metric.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.summary: Agile/Scrum, kanban, sprint planning, risk management, milestone tracking, delivery assurance.
skills.clientValue: Projects ship on time, on budget, with clear communication every step of the way.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.summary: Technology roadmapping, gap analysis, ROI modeling, build-vs-buy decisions, digital transformation strategy.
skills.clientValue: Stop guessing. Get a roadmap that connects technology decisions to business outcomes.

skills.name: MBAi Methodology
skills.summary: MBA + AI integration: sustainable business strategy, servant leadership, and 35+ years of technology — unified into an enterprise operating system.
skills.clientValue: Business strategy meets technical excellence meets AI automation. The whole is greater than the parts.

skills.name: Agentic AI Development
skills.summary: AI agent workflows, LLM integration, prompt engineering, AI-assisted code review, evaluation frameworks.
skills.clientValue: AI that doesn't just chat — it takes action. Automate complex workflows with intelligent agents.

skills.name: AI Governance & Ethics
skills.summary: Responsible AI frameworks, bias detection, model evaluation, cost management, human-in-the-loop patterns.
skills.clientValue: Deploy AI that you can trust, explain, and control. Avoid the pitfalls everyone else hits.

skills.name: Content Engineering
skills.summary: Structured content architecture, component-driven authoring, template systems, content reuse strategies.
skills.clientValue: Write once, publish everywhere. Content that's structured, searchable, and never goes stale.

skills.name: Technical Writing
skills.summary: 35+ years of technical communication. SSPs, POA&Ms, user guides, API docs, training materials, readability optimization.
skills.clientValue: Complex ideas explained clearly. Documents that people actually read and understand.

skills.name: SEO & Web Presence
skills.summary: Schema.org structured data, Open Graph, semantic HTML, meta optimization, Lighthouse SEO audits.
skills.clientValue: People find your site, understand it instantly, and share it beautifully across every platform.

skills.name: Design Systems
skills.summary: CSS custom property architecture, component libraries, theme systems (dark/light), responsive design, print styles.
skills.clientValue: Every page looks intentional. Brand consistency across every screen, every device, every printout.

skills.name: Federal Records Management
skills.summary: NARA retention schedules, disposition tracking, legal holds, version control, CUI marking, FOIA readiness.
skills.clientValue: Never fail a records audit. Every document tracked, retained, and disposed of by the book.

skills.name: USACE CDRL Management
skills.summary: Contract Data Requirements List tracking, deliverable workflow, status history, approval chains.
skills.clientValue: Every contract deliverable tracked from draft to government acceptance. Never miss a submission.

skills.name: Government Contracting
skills.summary: Federal acquisition knowledge, NAICS/PSC codes, past-performance documentation, proposal support.
skills.clientValue: Navigate the federal marketplace. Position your capabilities. Win contracts.

clientJourneys.title: Startup → MVP in 6 Weeks
clientJourneys.description: Transform your idea into a working product with authentication, data management, and a polished UI.
clientJourneys.outcome: A deployed, production-ready web app your investors can see and your users can try.

clientJourneys.title: Pass Your CMMC Assessment
clientJourneys.description: Close compliance gaps, build your SSP, automate evidence collection, and get assessment-ready.
clientJourneys.outcome: Certification achieved. DoD contracts unlocked. Continuous monitoring in place.

clientJourneys.title: Achieve Section 508 Compliance
clientJourneys.description: Full accessibility audit, remediation roadmap, VPAT authoring, and developer training.
clientJourneys.outcome: VPAT published. Zero critical violations. Federal agencies can buy your product.

clientJourneys.title: Adopt AI Responsibly
clientJourneys.description: From strategy to deployment: agentic workflows, governance framework, and cost-controlled AI integration.
clientJourneys.outcome: AI agents handling real work. Costs under control. Governance in place.

clientJourneys.title: Modernize a Legacy System
clientJourneys.description: Assess, plan, and execute migration from legacy tech to modern architecture without disrupting operations.
clientJourneys.outcome: Modern stack deployed. Data migrated. Users retrained. Zero downtime.

clientJourneys.title: Achieve FedRAMP Authorization
clientJourneys.description: SSP automation, continuous monitoring, POA&M management, and 3PAO audit preparation.
clientJourneys.outcome: FedRAMP Authorized. Listed in the FedRAMP Marketplace. Selling to every agency.
